error.incomplete-form: The form data is incomplete. Make sure you correct all highlighted fields.

helper-text.delete-break-optimizations: The selected entries will be deleted from the table. Any optimized schedules will not be affected.

hint.optimized-schedule-writing: The optimized schedule will be written directly to the Schedule level.

maintenance.caption: We are currently improving Break optimization
maintenance.details: We apologize for any inconvenience this necessary maintenance might cause you. The Break optimization should be available again in a few minutes. Thank you for your patience!

no-optimization-data.details: Start a new optimization by selecting a planning unit and a date range above to see its results listed here.
no-optimization-data.heading: No optimizations available

failure.general: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

info.day_models: The selected planning unit contains day models in the selected date range that could not get converted into activities. Breaks in these day models were not optimized.

tooltip.outdated-graph: The relevant graph data was generated when the optimization was initiated.

connection.offline: We were unable to connect. Please try to reload in a few minutes.
connection.reconnecting: Weâ€™ve lost the connection. We are trying to reconnect automatically.
